name: Chicken and Swiss Casserole
steps: Cook and cube 4-­‐6 chicken breasts. (I like to bake my chicken in garlic butter. If the chicken is thawed,
bake at 350° for 30-­‐45 minutes until done.)
Grease 9x13 pan and line it with cooked, cubed chicken and 1 lb. of grated swiss cheese. Pour the cans of
soup, diluted with the milk, over the chicken. Layer the prepared stuffing on top. Bake at 350° for 25 minutes.
